summary: When plans for a weekend vacation hit a dead end, a group of close-knit friends find themselves stranded in unfamiliar territory, pursued by a menacing, blood thirsty predator.
cast: Joey Lauren Adams|Elizabeth Gillies|Paul Iacono|Thorsten Kaye|Amaury Nolasco|Keke Palmer|Jeremy Sumpter|Parker Young|Eve|Mike J. Regan
keywords: cabin|woods|walkie talkie|boyfriend girlfriend relationship|group of friends
title: Animal
